Package CollegeManagementAdvance

Class Input

java.lang.Object
CollegeManagementAdvance.Input
public class Input extends Object
A class with scanners responsible for taking user input of various data types and also accepts details from a file
Since:
1.8
Version:
1.0
Author:
Karmandeep Singh
